mapper.insert: insert into cu_notice (title, category, content, created_time) values(#{title}, #{category}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: select * from cu_notice order by id DESC
SELECT n.*, f.uuid_filename, f.origin_filename FROM cu_notice AS n LEFT JOIN cu_notice_file AS f ON n.id = f.notice_id WHERE n.id = #{id}
select id, category, title, created_time, views from cu_notice order by id desc limit 5
